operatorGroups.title: Filter Operators by Type
operatorGroups.description: Supported operators for each built-in column filter type.

items.name: text
items.description: Contains, Starts with, Ends with, Equals, Not equals, Is empty, Is not empty

items.name: select
items.description: Equals, Not equals, In (multi-select), Not in, Is empty, Is not empty

items.name: number
items.description: Equals, Not equals, Greater than, Less than, Greater than or equal, Less than or equal, Is empty, Is not empty

items.name: date
items.description: Equals, Not equals, After, Before, Is empty, Is not empty
